initial.title: Are you ready to start the Finite State Game?

intro.title: You are enjoying a pleasent day in San Francisco

choices.text: Ok I enjoy San Fran (that's what cool people call San Francsico)

minion.title: All of a sudden you see the minions! They look so cute!!

badEnd.title: That wasn't very nice, sorry you're going to have to refresh if you want to try again. Be nicer next time.

hungryMinion.title: The minions tell you "Bo be bo ba ka? Badda bedo bo ba kana!"

choices.text: Oh no! I don't speak minion

banana.title: You're right! The poor guys are starving for some bananas, will you help them look for them?

bannanaSearch.title: Awesome! Let's look around San Francsico and see if we can find some bananas!

sf.title: Wow, the golden gate bridge! A beautiful staple of San Fran, but no bananas in sight!

choices.text: Let's cross it and find those Bananas!

sf.title: Coit Tower, a beautiful landmark of the city. Bananaless unfortunately.
Pier 39! A beautiful boardwalk, and if you're lucky you can find some sea lions!

choices.text: I'm looking for bananas not sea lions

sf.title: The Ferry Building marketplace! A great spot to grab lunch when you're in the area
The classic Avenue Tiled Steps! A beautiful public art display, no banana vendors around here though...

choices.text: Yeah doesn't look like a spot for a banana

sf.title: Oooh alcatraz, this prison has a whole lot of history, did you know native americans occupied this island for three years in the 70s?

sadMinion.title: We've looked everywhere! It's like there's no bananas in the whole city! So sorry minions.

hungry.title: Well, there's a Bi-Rite Creamery nearby, do you want to eat something there?

choices.text: Nah it's over, I'm going home
wait, is this whole project an ad for Bi-Rite Creamery?

um.title: Um, uh I mean uh um no.

BANANAICECREAM.title: Wow! This place has banana ice cream! Bob especially can't wait to order it! You really saved the day!

happyEnd.title: You found a banana treat after searching all the lovely spots of San Francsico! You won the Finitie State Game! Refresh to try for another ending ;)

bucko.title: Listen here bucko, stop asking questions and go back to the creamery. No one needs to know about this.

choices.text: sorry the jig is up, I'm not falling for your propaganda

depressedMinion.title: Those poor little guys, I guess no one can help them. Maybe if you refresh the page the day will end better.

dissapointedMinion.title: Are you sure you can't help? Look how cute they are!

stupid.title: I can't believe you don't speak minion.

choices.text: Why should I have to learn minion?
This game's stupid, you get an F

think?.title: That's ok, I can translate. They're basically just hungry.

andrewPlease.title: Dr. Harris please don't give me an F I swear this game is good you just have to choose another option and you'll have an amazing time I swear this state game is an amazing transformative experience it gets really good there are bananas in it and lots of funny lols please just give it another chance

choices.text: Ok, take me back a step
